documentation.introduction:
This component is the implementation of the VIC Cipher.
This component uses the original enciphering algorithm used by the Soviet agent Reino Häyhänen in the 1950s. It uses 1 substitution and 2 transpositions and the tables are composed using a 5-part key. This component also brings the latin alphabet support to VIC cipher.
该组件是VIC密码的实现。该组件使用1950年代苏联特工ReinoHäyhänen使用的原始加密算法。它使用1个替换和2个换位，并且表由5个部分组成。该组件还为VIC密码带来了拉丁字母支持。
documentation.usage:
This component needs has a key composed of 5 values. All values have to be provided, otherwise the component will not execute. All the parts of the key are provided as a string.
First part - Agent's personal number: 2 digit number greater than 0 and smaller than 33.
Second part - Phrase: A multiple word phrase of at least 20 alphabetical characters.
Third part - Password: A single word at least 6 letters long.
Fourth part - Date in a continental format: Date in a continental format is DD/MM/YYYY. Date has to be greater or equal than the First of January, 999 (1.1.999).
Fifth part - Initializing string: A single string composed of at least 5 digits.

该组件需要一个由5个值组成的键。必须提供所有值，否则组件将无法执行。密钥的所有部分均以字符串形式提供。第一部分-代理人的个人号码：大于0且小于33的2位数字;第二部分-短语：至少20个字母字符的多词短语;第三部分-密码：至少6个字母的单词。第四部分-大陆格式的日期：大陆格式的日期为DD / MM / YYYY。日期必须大于或等于999年一月一日（1.1.999）。第五部分-初始化字符串：单个字符串，至少由5位数字组成。
